page.title: 17SCHOOL FETE IN EMSWORTH
page.content: Every year St.James' School has a SUMMER FETE with stalls and displays. We bring in books,tins and any other objects needed to help raise money for the school.During school hours teachers prepare displays for us to perform. We had a vaulting display and also this year we had a keep-fit display. There were two special appearances; one was by Emsworth Shotokan Karate Club and the other was by the T.S. Unity Band. There were stalls selling plants, books,old records,cakes and refreshments.We also had side-shows such as skittles,the nerve tester, sponge throwing and face painting. We raised about{Â£600}which is going towards buying school equipment which all pupils benefit by.
